kpi.name: M1015C0

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF INTER SYSTEM HHO ATTEMPTS
kpi_info.use: The number of outgoing inter system hard handover attempts. This counter is updated for a measurement object in which source and target cells are defined. If cells A and B are in the active set and inter-system hard handover to GSM cell C is attempted, this counter is updated by 1 for objects (A,C) and (B,C). UPDATED: When the SRNC starts inter-system handover either by sending RANAP: RELOCATION REQUIRED to the core network (RT call) or RRC: CELL CHANGE ORDER FROM UTRAN to the UE (NRT call). This counter is not updated if the inter-system handover is prevented by an ongoing layer-3 procedure.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF INTER SYSTEM HHO ATTEMPTS
